route="o gen text"]Hint:
To colorize step just add CSS class "active" to particular list item under it´s "element.style" tab -> Identification.
The color is set by default to #00bcd4. You can change it under "Custom code" tab of the wrapping List element.[/ffb_param][/ffb_paragraph_3][/ffb_wrapper_2][/ffb_column_1][/ffb_section_0]
